Citing Jscatter
===============

Cite Jscatter as

 Biehl Ralf. (2018, October 24). Jscatter, a Program for Evaluation and Analysis of Experimental Data (Version 0.7.11). Zenodo. http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1470307
